title: Help: Chat log in game
body: Is there any option that i can mute enemy team in every game, instead of clicking mute button in every game?

replies.body:
Hey Turtle,

You can disable the All Chat option. You can do this by Opening the menu while in game with Escape, Navigate to Interface, Find the Chat section and uncheck the All Chat option. 

You won't see Enemy chat in game any more, but you won't be able to talk over all chat anymore either.
Yes, i found it!! Thanks, sometime their comment makes me bad behavior so i would rather unable all chat than get banned :D

Hi Deathless81C,

I think previously this was the behaviour, but people kept accidentally muting friends and this then caused the 2 week timer for gifting etc. to be reset, and you had to readd your friends I think.

As such, Riot changed the behaviour a while back to the current one - muting ingame does not carry out of game to avoid any out of game issues with friends and accidental mutes.
